## Overview

Welcome to the **Underwater Robotics Curriculum**, a 6-week program designed to teach students the fundamentals of robotics, engineering, and teamwork. Each week focuses on a specific aspect of building underwater robots, culminating in a fully functional ROV (Remotely Operated Vehicle).

Explore the weekly breakdown below to access detailed activities and presentations.

## Learning Outcomes

By the end of this curriculum, students will:

- Understand the principles of underwater robotics.
- Design and build a functional ROV.
- Collaborate in teams to solve engineering challenges.
- Apply programming and electronics skills to real-world scenarios.
